College_Name: Bengaluru Amirta College of Arts and Science, Bangalore
College_Summary: Bengaluru Amirta College of Arts and Science, Bangalore is run by the Meenakshiamman Educational Trust. It is a co-educational arts and science institution approved by the Government of Karnataka with affiliation to the Bangalore University. The institute offers undergraduate programs in the discipline of Commerce, Aviation Management, Tourism and Travel Management, etc.

Established in 1996, Arena Creative Campus, Bangalore is awarded the “Best Animation Award” at the 7th Dada Saheb Phalke Film Festival and has bagged the “Best Placement Award” from the year 2014 to 2022. The institute offers 13 degrees, diploma and certificate courses in the discipline of Animation Film Design, Graphics & VFX, 3D Digital Game Arts & Design, UI/UX Design, Graphics & Web Design and many more. The most popular courses of the institute include B.Sc in Graphics and VFX and the 2-year Animation Prime course. Apart from that, students can acquire skills in three in-demand industries: Animation, VFX & Gaming. Apart from that, the institute also offers a 3-year Diploma in Animation Film Design and a 1.5-year Game Development Program. Candidates need to have passed at least the 10th examination to take admission in Arena Animation Creative Campus, Jaynagar, Bangalore.

College_Name: The Oxford School of Architecture, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: The Oxford School of Architecture is a Bangalore-based private institution that was founded in 2017. It offers an undergraduate course in the discipline of Architecture. The college is approved by the All-India Council of Technical Education, and Council of Architecture, and is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University of Belgaum. Admission is granted to aspiring candidates depending on their merit in the preceding year's qualifying exam. Scores of entrance tests like COMEDK UGET and NATA are also considered during the final selection.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #40
          out of 40
          by
        India Today in Architecture

College_Summary: Located in the vibrant city of Bangalore, Atria University, Bangalore is one of India's first liberal science universities offering a project-based approach. The university offers four-year undergraduate programs in the discipline of Engineering, Design, Science and Business Administration and five interdisciplinary majors for each course such as Digital Transformation, Energy Sciences, Mobility, and Sustainable Life Sciences. The university takes pride in its holistic approach to education, emphasizing both academic rigor and real-world application. At Atria, the first year is referred to as the "finding your fit" phase, during which every student has the opportunity to explore various majors through practical projects, allowing them to experiment and discover their true calling. In the second year, each student carefully selects their degree and major, embarking on a well-structured path that includes over 30 live projects and three different internships spanning nine months. The overarching objective of the university is to equip students with the necessary skills to thrive in the industry, fostering their development into pragmatic and enterprising leaders of tomorrow.

College_Name: Institute of Bioinformatics and Applied Biotechnology - [IBAB], Bangalore
College_Summary: Institute of Bioinformatics and Applied Biotechnology (IBAB), Bangalore is an autonomous institute established in 2001. It is set up by the Department of IT, BT and ST, Government of Karnataka. The institute offers PG Diploma, M.Sc., and PhD courses across various specializations. Students seeking admissions into IBAB will have to appear for an entrance exam conducted by the institute followed by an interview.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Big Data Analytics

College_Name: Indian Institute for Human Settlements - [IIHS], Bangalore
College_Summary: The Indian Institute for Human Settlements is an Educational Research Center in Bangalore that is dedicated to changing India's human settlements in a way that is both sustainable and equitable. IIHS offers UG courses as well as Urban Fellows Programs, and plans to offer master's and doctoral programmes in the coming years.

St Claret Institute of Management (SCIM) is located in Bangalore and is a NAAC accredited institution for Management studies. SCIM comes under the aegis of St. Claret College (SCC). The college has showcased 100% placement with over 60 recruiters till date. Some of the top recruiters are Deloitte, IBM,Infosys, ICICI Bank, Wipro, Amazon etc. SCIM offers an MBA with specializations in areas of HR, Marketing, Finance and BFIS. Admissions are done of qualifying examinations and various entrance exams.

College_Name: ASK Institute of Hospitality Management and Culinary Arts - [ASKIHMCA], Bangalore
College_Summary: ASK Institute of Hospitality Management and Culinary Arts (ASKIHMCA), Bangalore is ranked as one of the Top 10 in India by Silicon India for Hospitality Management. ASKIHMCA Bangalore was started in the year 2011. The institute offers dual degree courses in the areas of Hotel, Hospitality and Tourism Management, Culinary Arts and Hospitality Management. Admissions is done on the basis of merit. The institute is led by a team of hospitality and culinary professionals with rich experience in both industry and academics with the mission of providing holistic education and 100% placement to all its successful learners.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor in Culinary Arts and Hotel Management

College_Name: RV Institute of Technology and Management
College_Summary: RV Institute of Technology and Management (RVITM), Bangalore is a new engineering institution established by Rashtreeya Sikshana Samithi Trust. The institute offers four undergraduate programs in the discipline of Computer Science & Engineering, Information Science & Engineering, and many more. Admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance examination.

Strate School of Design, Bangalore, is one of the top-rated European design schools that has expanded to India. Strate School of Design offers a 5-year integrated B.Sc. and M.Sc. degree in design. Strate is recognized as a leading French institute in the world of design. Over the years, Strate School of Design has built strong partnerships with major French and international schools and universities. Strate`s plan to expand its campus abroad, especially in Singapore and Bangalore, will benefit from its recognition and professional network.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Master of Science [M.Sc]

College_Summary: GITAM School of Science, Bangalore comes under the aegis of GITAM University, Bangalore. The college offers degree and research programs in the field of Science and Engineering. GITAM University (Visakhapatnam), assosciate institute of GITAM Bangalore, is ranked 67th in NIRF-2021 University Rankings.

Institute of Product Leadership (IPL), Bangalore established on 2012 is is Asia’s First Business School providing UGC accredited
MBA degree program and certification courses exclusively in Product Management and Marketing. IPL offers full-time MBA, part-time Executive MBA, PG and Certificate Courses in Data & Business Analytics, Strategy & Leadership, and many more. Admissions are based on merit and entrance tests.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Certificate in Product Management
Certificate Course in  Associate Product Manager

College_Name: NITTE School of Architecture, Planning & Design - [NITTE SAPD], Bangalore
College_Summary:
NITTE School of Architecture, Planning and Design (NITTE SAPD), Bangalore is affiliated with VTU. The institute offers B.Arch, B.Des and B.plan at the UG level. Admission to B.arch based on valid NATA scores. For admission to the B.Plan program, the Candidate must have appeared for any one of the following examination CET or COMEDK UGET or JEE paper 2/3 or NATA. Nitte University was ranked in the band 101-150 in NIRF Innovation. 
Know more NITTE University NIRF Ranking

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Planning (Urban and Regional Planning)

College_Name: LV Prasad Film and TV Academy, Bangalore
College_Summary: LV Prasad Film and TV Academy, Bangalore is part of Prasad Group, Asia’s largest provider of post-production services. LPVA offers Diploma and Certification courses in the field of Film Direction and Digital Filmmaking Acting. Admissions are done on the basis of merit. The institute has 2 other campuses in Chennai and Thiruvananthapuram.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Digital Film Making

College_Name: Ramaiah Institute of Business Studies, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Ramaiah Institute of Business Studies is a Bangalore based distinguished private college which came into existence in 2015 and has been accredited by NAAC with A++ grade. The college is affiliated to Bangalore University, recognized by the Government of Karnataka and an integral part of M S Ramaiah Foundation’s Group of Institutions.

College_Name: NLSIU Professional and Continuing Education- [NLSIU PACE], Bangalore

College_Summary: MBA ESG is a Bangalore based renowned private institution which came into existence in 2018 to provide finest quality business management knowledge to students. The college offers a Master program in various disciplines of management including Sports and Luxury Management. MBA ESG Bangalore is an integral part of MBA ESG Group, is approved by UGC and affiliated to Jain University. Highly educated, experienced and trained teachers teach in the institution and 20% of the total faculty is a mix of French faculty and sectoral experts hailing from Paris. Admission to college's courses is granted to aspiring candidates based on their result in last year's qualifying exam and score of entrance tests such as Karnataka PGCET, JET or CAT etc.

College_Name: International Centre for Applied Sciences [ICAS], Manipal
College_Summary: International Centre for Applied Sciences (ICAS), Manipal offers a unique International Engineering Transfer Program where the students can complete their first two years of engineering at Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE), India and the following two years in a premium university in USA/UK/Australia/Canada/France/Germany or any other country of their choice.

Vidyashilp University, Bengaluru is a private university in Bengaluru, established in 2021. The University is the culmination of an outstanding legacy of the Vidyashilp Education Group. It is recognized by the UGC and offers undergraduate and post-graduate programs such as B.Tech. (Hons.), BA (Hons.), B.A. (Hons.) with Research, B.M.S. (Hons.), B.M.S. (Hons. with Research), B.Des, and BSc. (Hons.). Vidyashilp University offers these courses for new-age domains like Data Science, Digital Business, Communication Design, Decision Science, and Start-up Management with a focus on domain expertise and interdisciplinary learning. Applicants’ performance in State/ National level entrance examinations are considered in the admission process. Moreover, the faculty members at the university are highly qualified and have a significant amount of work experience.

College_Name: Dr. NSAM FGC - Dr N.S.A.M First Grade College, Bangalore
College_Summary: Dr N.S.A.M First Grade College is a NAAC accredited (A+ Grade) Educational Institution located at Shivakote, Bengaluru. Dr. N.S.A.M. FGC comes under the banner of Nitte Education Trust (NET), Mangalore. The NITTE (Deemed to be university) is ranked 65 among universities by NIRF 2023. The institute is affiliated to Bengaluru City University and is recognised under 2(f) of the UGC Act, 1956.

Best International Business School, established in 2020 is a private institute which is affiliated to Alagappa University, Karaikudi. BIBS offers B.Com, BBA and B.Sc courses in various disciplines at the undergraduate level and offers MBA courses at the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered are done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit BIBS students include Vivanta, The PARK Hotels, Ibis, Novotel Hotel, Hyatt Regency among various others. Check: BIBS Bangalore Placement

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] ( Catering and Hotel Administration)

College_Summary: JAIN Online also offers 2 Value-Added Programs in Entrepreneurship and Analytics that can be pursued along with the main program.  JAIN (Deemed-to-be University) has partnered with a few leading organizations to create innovative content for niche electives. The Career Advancement Services Team works towards connecting students with the right job opportunities. The top recruiters that recruit students from JAIN Online include Amazon, Cognizant, Accenture, Infosys, Wipro, Bajaj Electricals, and TCS among various others.

College_Name: De Paul First Grade College, Mysore
College_Summary: De Paul First Grade College is a Catholic Minority Institution, affiliated to the University of Mysore. The College is guarded by the great monuments of culture and traditions and of wisdom and excellence. The college owns a beautiful campus, which is spread over 50 acres providing the best measurable facilities to its students.

Jigsaw Academy, Bangalore provides featured, short-term, long-term, online, and in-person diplomas in the discipline of Business Analytics, Data Science, Human Resource Analytics and many more. Admission to these courses are merit as well as entrance based. The eligibility criteria to pursue these programs require a Graduation degree with a minimum of 50% marks, experience and score in the entrance test and the interview. In addition to this, the academy has 110+ hiring partners and the average package offered to is recorded at INR 11.5 LPA. More 55,000 learners are associated with Jigsaw Academy.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Certificate in Product Management

College_Summary: Arunodaya College, Bangalore was established in the year 2006. The college is affiliated to the Bangalore University and is recognized by the Government of Karnataka. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Commerce and Arts. Admission to Arunodaya College depends on the performance in the last qualifying examination. In addition to this, the faculty at Arunodaya College are highly qualified and well trained. The college has 16 faculty members out of which 3 of them have completed their PhDs. Check: Arunodaya College Bangalore Faculty

AIMS IBS Business School, Bangalore was established in 1999 and is affiliated to Bangalore University. AIMS IBS B-School offers undergraduate, postgraduate and postgraduate diploma programs in the discipline of Management. Admission to the AIMS IBS Business School is done on the basis of CAT/MAT/CMAT/PGCET/KMAT scores followed by Personal Interview. Additionally, AIMS IBS Business School, Bangalore has quite an impressive placement record. The highest packae is offered at INR 13.9 LPA and the average package is offered at INR 5.5 LPA. The students got job offers from various sectors like Finance, Consulting, IT, Sales & Marketing, Education, KPO’s, Healthcare, Infrastructure, Real Estate, Media, Travel, and Energy. Check: AIMS IBS Business School Bangalore Placement

College_Name: GM Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research - [GMIPSR], Davanagere
GSSS School of Architecture For Women, Mysore
College_Summary: GSSS School of Architecture for Women (GSSS SOAW), Mysore is Karnataka's first architecture college for women established in the year 2020. This architecture school is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University and approved by the Council of Architecture and Govt. of Karnataka. The college offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Architecture.

College_Name: GSSS Simha Subbamahalakshmi First Grade College, Mysore
College_Summary: GSSS Simha Subbamahalakshmi First Grade College, Mysore, established in the year 1991, is approved by the Government of Karnataka and affiliated to the University of Mysore. It offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Commerce, Management and Computer Applications. Admission to GSSS SSFGC depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced. It has a dedicated Placement cell which provides 100% placement assistance to the students.

ABBS School of Management, Bangalore, established in 2009, is a prestigious autonomous Business School approved by AICTE and Government of Karnataka. The college provides PGDM courses in various specializations under Samagra Shikshana Samithi Trust (SSST). It is India's first B-School to offer an additional certification in Liberal Studies. Admission is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the entrance examination conducted by the institute. They have highly dedicated faculty members.

College_Summary: Sushrutha Ayurvedic Medical College, established in 2002 in Bengaluru is a prestigious institute for quality Ayurvedic education and Ayurvedic treatment. This medical college offers a BAMS program at the UG level.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary:
Sushrutha College of Nursing (SCN), Bangalore was established in 2003 with the prime objective of providing effective & efficient education in nursing. The college is a unit of Sushrutha Group of Institutions. It is one of the forefront nursing institutes in India and is counted among the top-rated Colleges in Karnataka with an excellent academic track record. The college grants undergraduate and postgraduate courses in nursing and specialisation in medical-surgery, gynaecology, community health, psychiatric, paediatric and so on..
Check: Sushrutha College of Nursing Course

HAL Management Academy, Bangalore established in 1969 is the nodal Training Centre of HAL offering Technology and Management programs to various stakeholders in the Aerospace Industry. The academy is approved by AICTE and offers diploma courses in the discipline of Management.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Executive Post Graduate Diploma in Aviation Management

College_Summary: Trinity College, Mysore is a private institute spread across 8 acres of area with well equipped infrastructural facilities and an eco friendly environment for the students. The college offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Management, Commerce and Computer Application. Admission to the college is done on the merit basis of the marks scored in the previous qualifying examination. Apart from this, the college has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students. The college has highly qualified and well experienced faculty members.

Sampurna Group of Institutions, established in 2010, is a private college affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University and approved by AICTE. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering, Science, and Management. Admission to the Sampurna Group of Institutions is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the state and national level entrance exams. The college has a dedicated Placement Cell headed by experts and professionals who provides placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters are Intergraph, Soma, CSS, Sonata, Infotech, Syntel, Sapiens, Wipro, Infosys, Cognizant, Polaris, L&T, Namdhari, and many more

College_Name: Institute of Business Management and Research - [IBMR], Bangalore
College_Summary: IBMR is a private institution established in 1999 with a vision of becoming the center of excellence for management education in India. The institute offers a 2 year PG Management program out of which 15 months is about classroom learning and focusing on developing practical skills and the remaining 9 months are for the paid internship to get hands-on experience about the industries.

College_Summary: Christ Academy Institute for Advanced Studies (CAIAS) is one of the top emerging colleges in South India affiliated with Bangalore University. It is administrated by Carmelites of Mary Immaculate (CMI). CAIAS is approved by AICTE, IIT Bombay and IIT Madras. The institute has five departments offering undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the fields of Commerce, Management, Science, Computer Science & Applications, and Arts & Humanities. CAIAS has a placement cell offering career opportunities to students. Wipro, BDO, Simple Learn, EXL, and HDFC Bank are among the top recruiters of CAIAS. The institute offers six types of scholarships to students. The campus area is spread over 33 acres. The institute has 2000+ active students and 65+ experienced faculty. CAIAS admission process is conducted in online mode.

upGrad Campus is an online platform started in the year 2015 to provide skill-oriented courses in collaboration with various organizations and experienced faculty members. The main objective of upGrad is to get students placed in their dream companies with lucrative packages. The institute began its first program in Entrepreneurship, and since then it has established courses in multiple domains for college students and working professionals. upGrad Campus offers nine certificate courses in Digital Marketing, Data Science, Full-Stack Development, Business Analytics, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Insurance Sales by India First Life, Insurance Sales by TATA AIA Life, Insurance Sales by Bajaj Allianz and Financial Modelling & Analysis with PWC India. Apart from this, the institute provides joint-degree programs with universities. upGrad Campus is a vertical of the institute that bridges the gap between academics and industry. upGrad Campus has collaborated with 300+ universities, more than 60,000 professors and 2M+ students.

College_Summary: Maharani Cluster University is a State-run University in Karnataka and is funded through the Rashtriya Uchchattar Shiksha Abhiyan (RUSA). The University is approved by UGC in 1986 and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC in 2002-03, further re-accredited in 2008-09. Maharani Cluster University offers UG and PG courses in various specializations such as BA, B.Com, BBA, BSc, MA, M.Com, MBA, and many more. Admission to the the flagship MBA program at Maharani Cluster University is based on Post Graduate Common Entrance Test (PGCET) which is conducted by the Karnataka government.

College_Summary: Chanakya University, established in November 2022, is a global, multidisciplinary, research-focused University at the forefront of higher education, located in Bengaluru, India. The University is led by scholarly Academicians, Educationists, and faculty from across the world. Prof. M.K. Sridhar is the Founder and Chancellor and Prof. Yashavantha Dongre is our first Vice-Chancellor at the helm, under their guidance the university is leading upfront in the education gamut. The institution is recognized by UGC and is aligned with the vision of NEP 2020.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor in Audiology and Speech - Language Pathology [BASLP]

College_Name: NITTE College of Pharmaceutical Sciences- (NCOPS), Bangalore
College_Summary:
NITTE College of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Bangalore is a part of NITTE Education Trust and is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Science (RGUHS). The institute is recognized by Pharmacy Council of India (PCI), All India
Council of Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and Govt. of Karnataka (GoK). The college offers Bachelor's Degree and Masters in Pharmacy. Admission to all the programs is done on the basis of merit in the qualifying examination. The college has started its admission process for the year 2024.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Pharmaceutical Management

College_Summary: Harsha Institutions is a private educational institute established in the year 2003 under Sri Srinivasa Charitable Trust located in Bangalore, Karnataka. The institute offers a range of schooling, undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs across five campuses. Harsha Institutions is approved by INC, KSNC, IAP, PCI, KSPB, and AICTE. It is recognized by the Government of Karnataka and the Board of Examining Authority (BEA), Bangalore. The institute is affiliated with Bangalore University, Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences (RGUHS), and KSDNEB. Harsha Institutions offers higher education in the fields of Nursing, Physiotherapy, Allied Health Sciences, Pharmacy, Paramedical Sciences and Management Studies.

T John Group of Institutions- Bangalore
College_Summary: T John Group of Institutions, established in 1993 is a private institute located in Bangalore and accredited by ACCA. T John Group offers various Diploma, UG, and PG courses in the discipline of Management, Pharmacy, Engineering, Science, Journalism, etc. The flagship courses of T John include BE across 5 specializations, MCA, MBA, GNM, B.Pharma, and M.Pharm courses. Apart from that, the college also offers B.Sc, B.Com, D.Pharma, and Ph.D. courses. For MBA admission, candidates need to qualify in CAT/ MAT/CMAT/ KMAT/PGCET.

IDeA World College, Bangalore is a Private college. It is affiliated with the Banglore University, Banglore for Degree and Graduate Programs. The college has additional international certifications from prestigious international design bodies. With convenient and flexible timings, the course suits both full-timers and part-timers. The college also provides weekend and weekday batches for working and non-working professionals.

College_Name: Bangalore Institute of Management Studies Campus - Powered by Sunstone, Bangalore
College_Summary: Bangalore Institute of Management Studies Campus, Bangalore comes under the aegis of Sunstone Eduversity. Bangalore Institute offers a 2 year MBA program, approved by the UGC. Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its MBA program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. Graduates from the University are placed in top-notch companies such as Accenture, Godrej, TATA, Mahindra, Byjus, Amazon, Infosys etc.

College_Name: IBMR Business School Campus - powered by Sunstone’s Edge, Hubli
College_Summary: Sunstone IBMR Business School Campus is powered by the Sunstone’s Edge, Hubli. It is a private institute providing MBA courses. Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its MBA program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. IBMR B-School Campus also provides a 9 month paid internship to gain hands-on industry experience.

Alliance Ascent college is a part of Alliance University and it offers BBA (Hons.), B.Com (Hons.) at the UG level and MBA and M.Com course at the PG level. Its flagship course is MBA to which admission is based through GMAT/ CAT/ NMAT/ XAT/MAT/ CMAT/ KMAT scores or the candidate has to appear for AMAT – Alliance Management Aptitude Test. Students enrolled in the MBA course intern at reputed companies. The college provides various merit scholarships based on National Entrance Exam Scores and Academic Results.

College_Name: Alliance School of Liberal Arts- Bangalore
College_Summary: Alliance School of Liberal Arts & Humanities is a private institute which is affiliated to Alliance University, Bangalore. Alliance School of Liberal Arts and Humanities offers BA (Hons.), B.Sc. (Hons.), BFA, BVA, MA in English (Creative Writing), Global Leaders’ Alliance (GLA) and Ph.D. from the School of Liberal Arts. As per  AIC-RAISE of the Atal Innovation Mission, Alliance School of Liberal Arts & Humanities has been ranked No. 1 in the National Sustainability Impact Institution’s Ranking (NSIIR). According to QS World University Ranking 2024, Alliance School of Liberal Arts & Humanities is ranked 751-800th in QS Asia University Rankings and Ranked 238th in Southern Asia.

Audiolife - School of Sound Engineering, Bangalore
College_Summary: Audiolife - School of Sound, established in 2012 is a private institute which is affiliated to Bharathiar University, Coimbatore. The Institute offers training in the field of Recording Arts & Music Technology through Sound Engineering course which is of 3 years duration. Recently, two new short term courses in sound engineering were introduced, each one of 6 month duration which could make a student employable at the end of 6 months in a particular arena of sound engineering at an affordable price. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. The average placement package offered to the Audio Life’s students ranges between INR 4.8 and 5.5 LPA. Some of the top recruiters that recruit Audiolife’s students include Lahari Music, Vedantu, Byju’s, Colors, Radio Mirchi 98.3 among various others.

Foundation Trust in 2003 in Bangalore, Karnataka. It is approved by the Government of Karnataka. The institute is affiliated with Bangalore University and recognized by UGC. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, value-added and certificate courses.

College_Name: ISBC College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Bangalore
College_Summary: ISBC College of Arts, Science and Commerce is a Bangalore-based famous private college that came into existence with an aim to offer quality, innovative and employment-oriented education to today’s youths and ambitious students who want to become top-notch professionals and business leaders. The college is affiliated to Bangalore North University and offers a broad range of Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma and Certification courses in the discipline of Finance, Management, Information Technology and Business, etc.

College_Summary: STOA, established in 2020 is a private institute which offers MBA Boot Camp program at the postgraduate level. The course is suitable for working professionals. So, students will be able to pursue this course while doing a job. Admission to the course will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit STOA’s students include Ernst and Young, Keka, Swiggy, Zomato and Cred among various others.

College_Name: Patel Institute of Science & Management, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Patel Institute of Science & Management - powered by the Sunstone is an acclaimed private college in Bangalore. It came into existence in 2006 and offers Bachelor and Master courses across disciplines like Business Administration, and Computer Applications. The college is approved by the All-Indian Council of Technical Education and is affiliated to Bengaluru North University. Admission to its courses is granted to aspiring individuals depending on the merit of the preceding year’s qualifying exam and score of entrance exams like CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT, KMAT, and Karnataka PGCET.

College_Name: Sambhram Group of Institutions - Powered by Sunstone’s, Bangalore

College_Summary: Don Bosco College is a Bangalore based leading private institute which offers a diverse range of Undergraduate programs in the discipline of Commerce, Arts, Science, Business Administration and Social Work. The DBC is founded upon the wealthy heritage and experience derived from premier 15 Don Bosco Universities, 252 Don Bosco Colleges and 3250 Don Bosco Schools situated in 134 countries of the world. Admission to DBC courses is granted to aspiring candidates based on their score in the previous year's qualifying exam. And for the institute's exceptional work and contribution in the education sector, it was awarded 'Outstanding Education Start-up of the Year - 2022' by Icons of Asia. DBC has collaborated with many reputed Colleges, NGOs, Training Institutes, Enterprises and Communities including Assam Don Bosco University, Globethics.net India, Indian Social Institute, English Language Teachers Association of India, Red Cross Society of Karnataka, HR Success Talk, Montfort College, Bengaluru, Don Bosco Green Alliance for the purpose of bridging the gaps between students skills and industry demands, strengthening students and teachers knowledge and improving the learning opportunities for them on a global scale.

College_Name: Royal College of Management Studies - [RCMS], Bangalore
College_Summary: Royal College of Management Studies is a Bangalore-based top-notch and well-known Private College, which was founded 7 years ago with the objective to offer the best quality education and exposure in the field of Commerce and Management to ambitious youths of our society. At present, the institute is offering courses like BBA, B.Com, B. Voc. and Diploma program in Hotel Management and is affiliated to Bangalore North University and Lingyas University of Faridabad. Admission to RCMS courses is given based on the student's marks in the previous year’s qualifying exam.

College_Name: R.R. Institutions - powered by Sunstone, Bangalore
Rathinam College of Liberal Arts and Science, Bangalore
College_Summary: Rathinam College of Liberal Arts and Science is a Bangalore based distinguished private college which was established with the aim to impart industry-oriented and employment driven knowledge to ambitious youths and students and offer UG Courses in the discipline of Commerce, Science, Business Administration and Computer Applications. The college is a child institute of RGI Group of Institutions and admission to its programs is granted to aspiring students based on their merit in previous year qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Vellore Institute of Technology is a Bangalore based institute which was established under the aegis of VIT Institutions and offers a wide range of Post Graduation in the discipline of Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Information System, Cybersecurity and Data Science etc. Admission to the college’s courses is granted to aspiring candidates based on their merit and performance in respective Bachelor and Master Degrees.

PW Institute of Innovation is a Bangalore-based top-notch private institute. The institute offers a 4-Year Residential Undergraduate Program in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence and admission to it is granted to interested candidates based on their merit of the previous year’s qualifying exam and marks of the entrance exam conducted by the institute itself. The program enables students to become fully prepared to work in the IT industry and facilitates them with personalized guidance from experienced industry mentors.

BGS College of Engineering and Technology, Bangalore
College_Summary: BGS College of Engineering and Technology is a Bangalore based well-known Private college which came into existence in 2022 under the aegis of Sri Adichunchanagiri Shikshana Trust and offers an Undergraduate and Postgraduate course in the discipline of Engineering and Business Administration. The college is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University of Belgaum and approved by AICTE. Admission to institute courses is granted to students based on their merit in previous year qualifying exam and score of COMEDK UGET, KCET, Karnataka PGCET or KMAT entrance test.

Clini Launch Research Institute, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Clini Launch Research Institute is India’s top private Clinical Research Institution which is situated in Bangalore and offers Advanced Diploma, Post Graduate Diploma and Certification courses in the disciplines like Clinical Trial Management, Clinical Data Management, Pharmacovigilance, Medical Writing, Regulatory Affairs and Medical Coding, Clinical SAS, Bio Statistics both in the distant and offline modes.

Aditya College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET], Bangalore

Karavali College of Physiotherapy, Mangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Karavali College of Physiotherapy is a Karnataka based constituent institution of Karavali Group of Colleges and was founded under the aegis of GR Education Trust. The college offers an Undergraduate course across numerous specializations of Physiotherapy and admission to this program is granted to students depending on their marks in preceding year qualifying exam.

Mesa School of Business is a Bangalore based and famous private business institution which was founded by proud alumni of Harvard Business School and Kellogg School of Management, Ankit Agarwal (who was also the Senior VP of Urban Company and Consultant of BCG) and Varun Limaye (who has worked as a Product Leader of Amazon and Head of Data at Pratham). The institute offers a Post Graduate course in discipline of Startup Leadership and admission to this program is granted to aspiring students depending on their merit in last year qualifying exam, score of entrance exams like GMAT, GRE, CAT, NMAT or XAT and overall performance in Personality Assessment Test and Personal Interview, both of which is conducted by the institute itself.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Program in Startup Leadership

College_Summary: Kishkinda University is a Karnataka based university which came into existence in 2023 under the aegis of Tungabhadra Education Health & Rural Development Trust and offers an extensive range of Undergraduate and Postgraduate Courses in disciplines like Computer Applications, Engineering and Technology and Business Administration. Admission to University’s courses is granted to aspiring candidates depending on their merit in last year’s qualifying exam and score of entrance exam (KUCET) conducted by the college or COMEDK, PGCET, KMAT, CAT, CMAT or MAT etc. The University has a total of 6 Educational Institutions, all of which have been founded in different years.

IIFA Lancaster Degree College is a famous private institution in Bangalore, that came into existence in 1991 and offers a wide variety of, employment-oriented and affordable Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in disciplines like Science, Design, Arts, Visual Arts, etc. Duration of courses ranges between 1-4 years and admission to these programs is granted to aspiring students on merit basis. The college also conducts An entrance exam for UG and PG Courses. IIFA is an integral part of the Lancaster Group of Institutions and is approved by Bangalore University.

College_Name: Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: The Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts is a Bangalore-based renowned private college that was established in 2017 and and offers Undergraduate, Diploma, and weekend courses in disciplines like Culinary Arts, Tourism Studies, Pastry and Bakery, etc. To pursue the Academy’s programs, students must have a valid merit in the preceding year's qualifying exam and at least basic knowledge of the English language. The best part of pursuing APCA courses is that no prior experience in cooking or baking is needed.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Gem and Jewellery, Udupi, Karnataka
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Gem and Jewellery is a private college in the Indian city of Udupi. It was established by the Gem & Jewellery Export Promotion Council in association with the National Institute of Design (NID), Ahmedabad. The college offers Certification courses across disciplines such as Jewellery Design, Jewellery Manufacturing, and Gemstone Identification. Admission to the IIGJ programs is granted to aspiring students depending on their merit in the previous year’s qualifying exam.

College_Name: Rathna College of Business Management, Mysore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Rathna College of Business Management is a Private institute in the Indian city of Mysore. It was established several years ago under the aegis of Jeevan Dharan Trust and offers an Undergraduate course in Banking Management, Digital Marketing, and Hotel Management. The college is accredited by ISO, registered with Niti Aayog, and the Government of India - Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, and affiliated with the University of Mysore. Admission to its programs is granted to aspiring candidates depending on their marks in the previous year’s qualifying exam.

Amity University is located in the Indian city of Bangalore. It offers UGC-recognized Undergraduate, and Postgraduate courses in Commerce, Design, Pharmacy, Science, Arts, Business Administration, Computer Applications, Law, Engineering and Technology, etc. The University is an integral part of Amity Education Group. It has close ties with IBM, Sun Microsystems, Oracle, CA Technologies, and EMC2 to ensure that students in the end don’t just get a degree but both industrial exposure, and an in-depth understanding of global business practices.

College_Name: Charan’s International Institute of Fashion Technology, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Charan’s International Institute of Fashion Technology is a well-known and ISO-certified private college located in the Indian city of Bangalore. It was established by Charan’s Group of Institutions and offers Undergraduate, Diploma, and Certifications across disciplines like Fashion Design, Fashion Styling, Fashion Business Management, Foundational and Advanced Makeup, Hairstyle artistry, Photography, Barbering and Grooming, Nail Art, etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Fashion and Apparel Design)

College_Name: Charan’s International Institute of Aviation and Hospitality, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Charan’s International Institute of Aviation and Hospitality is a Bangalore-based highly prestigious college. It was founded a few years back by the Charan Group and offers undergraduate and Diploma courses in Business Administration, Aviation, and Hospitality Management. The institution is approved by the Aerospace and Aviation Sector Skill Council, and affiliated to Bengaluru City University and Jawaharlal Nehru Technical Education -Delhi. Admission to CIIAH’s programs takes place based on the merit of students in last year’s qualifying exam. Further, it has strong tie-ups with the Indo-France Chamber of Commerce and the Indo-Italian Chamber of Commerce to provide top-notch opportunities to young minds in the Aviation and Hospitality sector.

College_Name: Charan’s International Institute of Hotel Management, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Charan’s International Institute of Hotel Management is a renowned private institute in Bangalore. It was established to produce highly competent professionals and offers Advanced Diploma, Diploma, and Certification courses in the disciplines of Tourism, Hotel and Hospitality Management. The college is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technical Education (JNTE)-Delhi and Tourism and Hospitality Skill Council (THSC)- Govt of India, and approved by the National Skills Development Council, and ISO. Admission is granted to aspiring students solely on a merit basis. And the best part is, along with weekdays, weekend lectures are also available.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Hotel and Hospitality Management

College_Name: Department of MBA, RNS Institute of Technology -[RNSIT-MBA], Bangalore
Bangalore Integrated Management Academy, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: GET presents Bangalore Integrated Management Academy (BIMA), a Bangalore-based top-notch private college established in 2003. The college is affiliated with Bangalore University, and approved by AICTE, and Govt. of Karnataka. It offers Bachelor’s and Master’s courses across disciplines like Commerce, Business Administration, and Computer Applications. Further, Admission is granted to ambitious students on a merit basis. In addition, scores of entrance exams like CMAT and KMAT are also considered when shortlisting individuals for the MBA program.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Advanced Diploma in Aviation, Hospitality and Travel Tourism
